name: pclass
remark: We can use this as a proxy for socio-economic status (SES)

name: sibsp
meaning: number of siblings/spouses aboard the Titanic
remark: siblings = brother, sister, stepbrother, stepsister; spouses = husband, wife (mistresses and fiances were ignored)

name: parch
meaning: number of parents/children aboard the Titanic
remark: parents = mother, father; children = son, daughter, stepson and stepdaughter (some children travelled only with nanny, therefore parch = 0 for them)

name: embarked
value/range: C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton
